Description.Text:
Property Location
Los Zocos Club Resort is centrally located in Teguise, walking distance from Las Cucharas Beach and close to Costa Teguise Golf Club. This family-friendly apartment is within the vicinity of Cesar Manrique Foundation and Sports City of Lanzarote.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 324 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and sofa beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 5 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a nightclub and outdoor tennis courts. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this apartment. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at one of the apartment's 2 restaurants. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this apartment. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at one of the apartment's 2 restaurants. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Las Cucharas Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Costa Teguise Golf Club - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Cesar Manrique Foundation - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Sports City of Lanzarote - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Centro Asociado de la UNED de Lanzarote - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Santa Barbara Castle - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Cactus Garden - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Deiland Shopping Center - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
Pocillos Beach - 16.5 km / 10.2 mi
Rancho Texas Park - 17.3 km / 10.8 mi
Lanzarote Golf Resort - 17.6 km / 10.9 mi
Jameos del Agua - 18.2 km / 11.3 mi
Cueva de los Verdes - 18.3 km / 11.4 mi
Puerto del Carmen Beach - 19.3 km / 12 mi
Guinate Animal Park - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi

The preferred airport for Los Zocos Club Resort is Arrecife (ACE-Lanzarote) - 13.1 km / 8.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
